goal.en: The course is intended to introduce ERP knowledge to students in management schools. As ERP is the core e-business system and encompass all aspects of business practice, the course covers the e-business applications of all basic business theory, such as sales, production planning, accounting, human resource management and e-business architecture. Students taking the courses are supposed to have basic knowledge of accounting and production planning. The course will introduce the application of the knowledge in e-business but will not introduce the management knowledge again. The course is part of the education program of Chinese ERP society and students taking the course can take the certification exam in the summer break. The grade will be given based on the midterm and final examines and the show up ratio in the classes. The course include following topics:  ERP introduction  Business process modeling introduction  ERP in financial modules  ERP in logistic modules  ERP in HR modules  ERP implementation  ERP and e-Business ＆ Digital Transformation
goal.ch: 本課程旨在向管理學院的學生介紹ERP知識。 由於ERP是電子商務的核心系統，涵蓋了商業實踐的各個方面，介紹ERP系統的基本觀念與各組成模組的運作概念，作為修習ERP進一步課程的基礎。 因此課程涵蓋了電子商務應用的所有基本商業理論，如銷售、生產計劃、會計、人力資源管理和電子商務體系結構。 參加課程的學生應具備會計和生產計劃的基本知識。 課程將介紹這些知識在電子商務中的應用，但不再介紹管理知識。 該課程屬於中國ERP學會教育計畫的一部分，參加課程的學生可以在暑假參加認證考試。 成績將根據期中、期末考以及班級出現率來決定。 課程包括以下主題：  ERP簡介  業務流程建模介紹  ERP中的財務模組  ERP物流模組  ERP 人力資源模組  ERP實施  ERP 與電子商務及數位轉型
